title: Victor Vran Motorhead Through the Ages-CODEX
description:
C O D E X
P R E S E N T S

Victor Vran: Motorhead Through The Ages (c) EuroVideo Medien
Release Date: 06/2017 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Action
Motrhead: Through the Ages is a wild tour through the mythos of the
loudest band in the world! Bring the mighty Snaggletooth back to
life with the help of Lemmy and Lloyd Kaufman! Harness the powers
of the immortal Motrhead to defeat frightening new enemies in three
demon-infested worlds intertwined with the songs of the band
Slay your opponents to the rhythm of the band's greatest riffs
Take the hunt to 3 unique worlds, inspired by Motrhead Discover
the Monuments of Rock New weapon classes - Revolvers and Guitars
Unleash new Motrhead themed demon powers 3 New outfits inspired by
Lemmy, Phil and Mikkey Clash with Scorpions, Hellhounds and
Succubi New bosses from the world of Motrhead 20 new rock themed
destiny cards Guest starring legendary director Lloyd Kaufman
Don't forget to powerslide

For more info go to: http://store.steampowered.com/app/462290/

Extract
Burn or mount the .iso
Run setup.exe and install
Copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
Play

NOTES: This is also known as the "Overkill Edition" and the
following DLC is included:

Victor Vran: Wanderer Outfit
Victor Vran: Original Soundtrack and Art Book
Victor Vran: Highlander Outfit
Victor Vran: Cauldron of Chaos Map
Victor Vran: Tome of Souls Weapon
Victor Vran: Motorhead Through The Ages
Victor Vran: Fractured Worlds

General Notes:

Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
trying to go online
If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
to run this game with admin privileges instead

CODEX is currently looking for

nothing but competition!

Greetings to CPY

LNK^CPS
02/2015
